text: Buruny () is a rural locality (a settlement) and the administrative center of Astrakhansky Selsoviet, Narimanovsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 2,147 as of 2010. There are 20 streets. == Geography == It is located 85 km from Astrakhan, 120 km from Narimanov. == References == Category:Rural localities in Narimanovsky District
title: Buruny
